content.question: The first paragraph is organized to heighten interest in the subject by

choices.label: first suggesting political causes of an infrastructure failure, then revealing jellyfish as a surprising agent of this event
first highlighting the dangers posed by jellyfish in the past, then enumerating new problems they might cause in future
first establishing the setting of her story, then explaining why the appearance of jellyfish in this setting was unexpected
first alluding to political strife in Manila, then explaining how the strife made the cityâ€™s infrastructure vulnerable to jellyfish

content.answer: first suggesting political causes of an infrastructure failure, then revealing jellyfish as a surprising agent of this event

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain how an argument demonstrates understanding of an audience's beliefs, values, or needs.
